name: localsend
description: Localsend is a cross-platform, self-hosted file sharing app that sends files directly over Wi-Fi. It requires no internet and supports encrypted sharing between devices without external servers.
features: Local File Sharing: Wi-Fi direct transfer, No internet required, Cross-platform. Share files without cloud.
Encrypted Transfer: Secure sharing, Privacy-focused, No external servers. Keep files private.
Multi-Platform: Windows, macOS, Linux, Android, iOS. Share between any devices.
Simple Interface: Drag and drop, Quick sharing, Easy discovery. File sharing made simple.
Device Discovery: Automatic detection, Network scanning, Quick pairing. Find nearby devices easily.
Batch Transfer: Multiple files, Folder sharing, Queue management. Share many files at once.
No Setup Required: Zero configuration, Instant use, No accounts. Start sharing immediately.
Open Source: Free forever, Community-driven, Transparent code. Trustworthy file sharing.
